s0052: Prince Guang brought out his hidden armored troops to attack King Liao's followers, completely exterminated them, thus self-established as king, this was Helü.
s0053: Helü then enfeoffed Zhuan Zhu's son as upper minister.
s0054: After seventy plus years then Jin had Yu Rang affair.
s0055: Yu Rang was Jin person, formerly served Fan clan and Zhonghang clan, without known reputation.
s0056: Left served Zhi Bo, Zhi Bo much honored favored him.
s0057: When Zhi Bo attacked Zhao Xiangzi, Zhao Xiangzi with Han, Wei united plotted exterminate Zhi Bo, exterminated Zhi Bo after divided his land three ways.
s0058: Zhao Xiangzi most resented Zhi Bo, lacquered his head to make drinking vessel.
s0059: Yu Rang fled hid in mountains, said: 'Alas!
s0060: Scholar dies for one who knows him, woman adorns for one who pleases her.
s0061: Now Zhi Bo knows me, I must avenge enmity die, to repay Zhi Bo, then my soul not ashamed.'
s0062: Thus changed name surname became criminal, entered palace smeared toilets, middle hid dagger, wished stab Xiangzi.
s0063: Xiangzi went to toilet, heart moved, seized questioned toilet smearing criminal, was Yu Rang, inside held blade weapons, said: 'Wish avenge Zhi Bo!'
s0065: Xiangzi said: 'He righteous person, I carefully avoid him.
s0066: Moreover Zhi Bo died without descendants, his minister wishes avenge enmity, this world's worthy person.'
s0068: Dwelt moment, Yu Rang again lacquered body became leper, swallowed charcoal became mute, made appearance unrecognizable, begged in market.
s0070: Walking saw his friend, friend recognized him, said: 'You not Yu Rang?'
s0072: Friend wept for him: 'With your talent, submit serve Xiangzi, Xiangzi must approach favor you.
s0073: Approach favor you, then accomplish what desired, moreover not easy?
s0074: Why thus harm body bitter form, wish seek avenge Xiangzi, not difficult!'
s0075: Yu Rang said: 'Already submitted served person, yet seek kill him, is harbor two hearts serve lord.
s0076: Moreover what I do extremely difficult!
s0077: Yet reason do this, will shame world later generations ministers harbor two hearts serve lord.'
s0079: Having left, moment, Xiangzi when exit, Yu Rang hid at bridge he must pass.
s0080: Xiangzi reached bridge, horse startled, Xiangzi said: 'This must Yu Rang.'
